creator: paw6

title: Password Management Problem
content:
Hi! Sorry if this is addressed somewhere & I just glossed over it by accident, but here's the problem:

I use a Password Manager called Byepass on several devices, but recently decided to remove it from my laptop as it was slowing my browser down considerably -- the problem is, once it was removed, Firefox just kinda... refused to remember any of my passwords? Even though it's synced to my account + imported them again from another browser? It says I don't have any logins saved, but on my mobile devices (all attached to the same account) I can clearly see them being there? Do I need to uninstall & then reinstall Firefox? I'd rather not, but I will if I have to.

Thank you!
creator: gisnape

title: Mensaje habilitacion automatica de filtros

title: can not install google translate
content:
Hi there

Can not install google translate on my toolbar. When clicking the "puzzle" to access extensions google translate is there but it's greyed out, thus not accessible, when clicking on it there are no options to pin to toolbar as other extensions have that option, clicking on options if shows "manage extension" " remove extension" and " report extension"

title: How do I get important gmail notifications?
content:
When I receive important gmail emails, I get notifications both sound and a popup in the lower-right corner, even if no Firefox window reaches that spot. Next to that popup X there's a ⋯ button and clicking it has 2 settings options and neither of those leads to something which could point to how I get notified. In about:config I entered "gmail" and got "extensions.webextensions.ExtensionStorageIDB.migrated.checkerplusforgmail@jasonsavard.com" but it's not showing in enabled extension.

How can I dis/enable it and possibly change the settings of what notifies me of important gmail emails?

Thank you kindly for your help
creator: DynV

title: csv password file
content: How do I import the firefox passwords I saved as csv file from firefox into firefox. I am not importing from a different browser which is the only option offered. I'm importing from the newly created csv file as instructed by firefox.
creator: gazinnz
